title: letter_to_judge_lamberth.20090508.dcd
abstract:
May 12, 2009
The Honorable Chief Judge Royce C. Lamberth
United States District Court for the District of Columbia
333 Constitution Avenue, N.W.
Washington, D.C. 20001
Dear Chief Judge Lamberth:
I am writing to respectfully urge that the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia 
and your support staff at the Administrative Office of the Courts take steps to come 
into compliance with the laws and rules that require you to protect the privacy of the 
people that appear before you.  Compli
